titleStmt.title: The Dutch courtezan As it vvas playd in the Blacke-Friars, by the Children of her Maiesties Reuels. VVritten by Iohn Marston.
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] P[urfoot] for Iohn Hodgets, and are to be sould at his shop in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
